bill.summary: 9/21/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to make matching contributions to: (1) the Palisades Interstate Park Commission for the acquisition of Sterling Forest, New York; and (2) Passaic County, New Jersey, toward the outstanding amount owed for certain lands, as specified in the consent judgment in County of Passaic against MPS Corporation, Sterling Forest Corporation, and Sterling Forest Development Corporation.
